segments.text: It's heartbreaking to see this potential tragedy in the making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her routine, missing all the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflowing from the sink, ruining everything it touches.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle growing larger, threatening slips and falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware of the chaos right at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks so vulnerable, one wrong move away from disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Reaching for cookies in that precarious position.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits eagerly, but this could end in tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocent fun might lead to real harm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tidy garden outside highlights how fragile this home moment is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a deep sorrow for what might happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can't they see the risks in this ordinary scene?
segments.speaker: PAR
